title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: While serving atHayston, near Peebles, he worshipped at the sameshrine, a Sabbath - day's journey of fifty miles!With such bodily exercise, a weariness to the flesh,one would have thought he would have profitedlittle by things spiritual.
